abstract: A top executive at Merrill Lynch, which last month accepted a takeover offer from Bank of America, is likely to leave with more than $10 million in compensation, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: Merrill’s Kraus to Get $10 Million Exit Payout, Report Says
